label: WasteMaterialRecoveryDisposalProcess
comment: A process of either regaining substances in usable form, or of getting rid of substances regarding waste material, such as production waste.

objectProperties.comment: A process certificate applicable to this waste material recovery disposal process.
A textual description of a waste material recovery disposal process.
The code specifying the type of waste material recovery disposal process.

referencedBy.comment: A waste material recovery disposal process applicable to this specified material.
